> <OLD>
>
> Tucson quickly does the same as Night Viper, and prepares to take on the
> guards if need be, holding his blade in a defensive position.  He listens,
> with eyes shut.
>
> " Six figures approaching.  By the sound of their footsteps and their
> thermal output, they're a group of Sharkticon guards.  They're heading our
> way.  Quickly, find any corner you can find that isn't exposed to light, and
> remain silent, with signatures scrambled.  They use signature tracking to
> hunt down their prey."
>
> He takes a nimble but defensive pose, ready to defend his comrades if need
> be

<NEW>

The SHARKTICON-like guards march down the hall until they get about
halfway and then stop at a rather large door, three standing on one
side of it and three standing on the other side of it.

The door slides open and SABERBACK stepped out and looked at the
SHARKTICONS. "Good, you have arrived." His face was filled with
impatience. "Here is, take him."

Another figure came walking out of the room, a large figure, large and
broad, it was RHINOX!! He came walking out as if he were in some sort
of trance.

"Take him to his cell." SABERBACK said. "He is almost finished his
treament. It has taken me some time to rebuild him, but he is nearly
complete." The guards nodded as they began to prod RHINOX with thier
butt of thier rifles, forcing him to come back in the direction they
just came from, which was away from BIG CONVOY, his team and TUSCON.

Without a further word SABERBACK went back into the chamber, his door
sliding shut behind him.

(TAG)

Preston
